item.title: Anthropic’s AI-generated blog dies an early death
item.description: Anthropic was experimenting with an AI-generated blog. TechCrunch profiled it. Then, Anthropic shut it down.

item.title: Warner Bros to split cable and streaming businesses in major restructuring
item.description: As cable television continues to experience stagnation, with the trend of cord-cutting growing stronger each year, Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) is ada...

item.title: Google fixes bug that could reveal users’ private phone numbers
item.description: The bug allowed a researcher to uncover recovery phone numbers of nearly any Google account.

item.title: Qualcomm to acquire semiconductor firm Alphawave Semi for $2.4B
item.description: Qualcomm has acquired Alphawave Semi, a U.K.-based semiconductor company focused on high-speed data center connectivity, for around $2.4 billion.

item.title: OpenAI updates ChatGPT’s voice mode with more natural-sounding speech
item.description: ChatGPT's natural-sounding voice mode just got a big update, including more natural-sounding synthetic voice options.
